roleset.name: parenthetical discourse expression "quote unquote"
roleset.note: UNQUOTE-V NOTES: Frames file for unquote based on sentences in Webtext 25.2, added by Kevin (from unquote.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: quoted utterance (will not be there if sentence is treed properly)

example.name: from Webtext 25.2
example.text: What if, *PRO* quote unquote, "the government of Prime Minister Fouad Al Siniora" fell?
